title: Effective Learning Experience Development for MOOC Design and Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course exploring the application of MOOC design principles to real-world educational settings for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more learner-centered strategies in MOOC design.
Learners can establish evaluation criteria for MOOC content through inquiry-based learning activities.
Learners can suggest ways to enhance interactivity using technology-enhanced tools.
Learners can develop MOOC improvement plans by applying evidence-based strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
